oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sketch of house used as military hospital and surrounding buildings
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Landscape-style pencil sketch of a very fine federal style home and four outbuildings. The house at center is identified as a hospital, and the depot at left is acting as a telegraph station. Written on reverse is "Monday December 28th 1863 afternoon" and "Mrs. Hemmings." Visible behind the fence is a black man.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
